title: The Sticky Cancelled at Prime Video After One Season
description: The Sticky has received some not-so-sweet news: Prime Video has cancelled the dark comedy series after just one season, TVLine has confirmed. According to our sister site Deadline, which broke the news, The Sticky did not bring in enough of an audience in the weeks since its six-episode first — and now only — season […]
author: Gabriela Silva

title: Surface Season 2 Premiere: Gugu Mbatha-Raw, Millie Brady Talk Sophie and Eliza’s ‘Dark History’ and ‘Messy’ Dynamic
description: Maybe Thomas Wolfe was right. Maybe you really can’t go home again. In the Season 2 premiere of Apple TV’s Surface (now available to stream), that’s exactly what Sophie Ellis/Tess Caldwell (Gugu Mbatha-Raw) learns as she prepares to take on a family of wealthy Brits she shares murky history with. As she begins exploring London […]
author: Nick Caruso

title: Sexy Lucifer Alum & Empire Couple Headline Lifetime Thrillers; We Spill the Tea!
